sections.heading: Kubernetes ConfigMaps
sections.content: ConfigMaps store non-confidential configuration data as key-value pairs. They can be consumed by Pods as environment variables, command-line arguments, or configuration files in volumes.

sections.heading: Kubernetes Services - Networking
sections.content: Services provide stable network endpoints for Pods. Types include ClusterIP (internal access), NodePort (external access via node), LoadBalancer (cloud load balancer), and ExternalName (DNS alias).

sections.heading: Streamlit Session State - State Management
sections.content: Session State allows you to share variables between reruns of your Streamlit app. Use st.session_state to store data that persists across user interactions. Initialize with st.session_state.key = value and access with st.session_state.key.
